Interface ModernMaterialStore

All Superinterfaces:
MaterialStore
public interface ModernMaterialStore extends MaterialStore
Modern interface for polymorphic material store with async operations. Extends the base MaterialStore with modern Java features.
Since:
2024-09-15
Version:
4.0
Author:
Navid Mohaghegh
